issuer.name: College of Professional Studies, Continuing Education
issuer.description: Designed by expert practitioners and delivered on your terms as a busy professional, our continuing education workshops will help you sharpen your skills. Tangible skills for today, not theory for tomorrow.

name: Innovation Challenge
description: Earners of this badge worked with a non-profit or for-profit partner to create an innovative solution around a pressing challenge. The challenges varied in scope and theme depending on the partner. Earners worked over the allotted time chosen by the partner to develop solutions and presented those solutions at the end of the Innovation Challenge. They were given the opportunity to work 1:1 with the partner to understand the scope of their challenge. Earners also had the opportunity to attend in-person workshops hosted by the Roux Entrepreneurship team to help form their solutions.

criteria.narrative:
- Develop a basic business plan for a startup idea.
- Understand the importance of market research.
- Explore methods to analyze competitors and the competitive landscape.
- Successfully communicate their idea to a large audience.
